package.name: ctu_cras_norlab_x500_sensor_config_1
package.description: CTU-CRAS-NORLAB X500 UAV Sensor configuration: - 3D medium range lidar Ouster OS0-64 - upward Intel Realsense D435 (RGBD camera) - downward Intel Realsense D435 (RGBD camera) - frontward Basler dart daA1600-60um with DSL165A lens (RGB camera) - standard SubT IMU
package.author: Matej Petrlik
